name: Flame Eater Swarm
description: The Flame Eater Swarm is a collective of tiny, flame-consuming creatures. It is notable for its ability to extinguish fires and is often seen in environments where fire magic is prevalent.
memorable: It extinguishes fires, disrupting spellcasters' tactics and bolstering its own attacks afterward.
goals: To consume flames and harass fire-wielding opponents.
relations: Might be found alongside creatures that rely on fire magic or in locations affected by fire.
environment: Commonly found in areas with a lot of fire sources, including battlefields involving fire spells.
strengths: Immunities to fire damage and numerous condition immunities, making it challenging to control in combat.
weaknesses: Low Strength and Constitution scores, making it vulnerable to physical attacks if not utilizing its abilities.
attacks: Utilizes bite attacks for piercing damage and capitalizes on consumed flames to deal additional fire damage.
most_powerful_ability: Consume Flame, which allows it to extinguish normal fires and bolster its bite attack's damage significantly.
senses: Has blindsight up to 30 feet, allowing it to detect creatures without relying on sight.
additional_information: Can occupy the same space as other creatures.
Cannot regain hit points or accumulate temporary hit points.
Effective against fire-dependent spells and abilities.
Multiattack action creates consistent pressure on targets.
Does extra fire damage after consuming flames.
test_queries: beast that attacks with fire damage
